/usr/bin/clang++  -arch arm64 -isysroot /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX15.2.sdk -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names CMakeFiles/vulkanTutorial.dir/main.cpp.o -o vulkanTutorial  -Wl,-rpath,/opt/homebrew/lib -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib /opt/homebrew/lib/libglm.dylib /opt/homebrew/lib/libglfw.3.4.dylib /usr/local/lib/libvulkan.dylib
